title: AOMEI Backupper Technician Plus 2.0.3  +Boot CD [JUHAX69X]
description:
AOMEI Backupper Technician Plus 2.0.3  +Boot CD [JUHAX69X]
 
 
 
A feature-packed software solution that helps you create backups for files, folders and partitions, then restore data when needed. Complete Windows Backup Software for PCs, Laptops, and Workstation. Backup everything to anywhere with various ways. Get everything back from backed-up image files.
 
- Backup: easily and safely save everything, including system, disk, partition and individual files.
 
- Restore: fast and reliable disaster recovery, supporting sector alignment and selective restoration.
 
- Clone: step-by-step transfer OS or upgrade hard drive without reinstalling Windows and applications.
 
- Utilities: command line backup, merge images, backup schemes, make bootable discs, VSS, etc.
 
 
 
File Restore: Restore backed-up versions of files & folders that are lost, damaged,
or changed accidentally, like emails, music, movies, etc.

System Restore: Return your computer's system files and programs to an earlier
state when everything was working properly.

Disk & Partition Restore: Completely recover the entire hard disk, partition or
dynamic disk volume to the point you ever backed up.

Selective File Restore: Just recover individual files what you need from disk & partition images without restoring the entire image to save time.
 
Supported Operating Systems:
 
- Windows 8.1 (all editions, 32/64-bit)
- Windows 8 (all editions, 32/64-bit)
- Windows 7 (all editions, 32/64-bit)
- Windows Vista (all editions, 32/64-bit)
- Windows XP (all editions, 32/64-bit)
 
What's different about Technician Plus Edition:
 
- Available to be used on Unlimited Servers and Unlimited PCs within one company and
provide profitable technical services for unlimited companies and personal customers.
- Available to Provide Technical Service to Clients
 
What's new in version 2.0.3:
 
- Preserve file timestamps and date when restoring files.
- Fix the problem: "The selected destination partition is too small when restoring system".
 
Homepage: www[dot]backup-utility[dot]com/technician
 
 
 
I have installed this for Myself too and it seems to work. No problemos.
